summary: Retex of dwarven sword and the scabbard
descriptionHtml:
So this is my first mod/texture of any sort so keep that in mind, but i basically just made this to mess around , but i thought it ended up kinda cool. And I know that its not perfect and someparts look funny, but over all i like it and so i thought maybe someone else might too. At the very least maybe someone who is better at this can take the idea and make it better.

UPDATE:
- I made the hilt darker to match the rest of the handle better.

To Install:
- copy the folder called textures into your \"Data\" folder.

Also I am planning on doing some more(and better) textures and if anyone likes this one enough to ask, I can work on making it better too. Lastly, two things that I would really like from you guys are tips to make things better and requests for more stuff. 

And yes, for those of you that notice, I did get my basic design idea from the sword in Eragon.

CREDITS:
     -  Shantih - the base .dds files are from his mod \"Steel Dwarven Armour and Weapons\"                            (Check it out at --> http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=373 )
author: cmat1120
